							                    Mixed Gliomas
							                    Treatment of mixed gliomas may include the following:         -  Surgery and radiation therapy. Sometimes chemotherapy is also given.         Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with adult mixed glioma.
